second_translate: Maybe I had vaguely known.
Fiona accepted me...

hangle: 어렸을 때 봐왔던 정 때문이었단 걸.
first_translate: ...because of the affection we had for each other when we were young.
second_translate: ...because of the affection she had for me from when we were young.

first_translate: she didn’t want to lose me...
second_translate: She didn't want to lose me.

hangle: 반짝였던 우리의 어린 시절을 소중히 이어 나가고 싶었기 때문이었다는 것을.
first_translate: ...and wanted to continue our childhood that shone brightly.
second_translate: ...and wanted to cherish and continue our childhood that shone brightly.
Until now,

first_translate: I wanted to stay by her side,
second_translate: I wanted to stay by your side,

first_translate: so I tried not to think about it.
second_translate: I deliberately avoided thinking about it.

first_translate: but if I’m a burden to her...
second_translate: If I’m a burden to you,
If I hurt you,
Even now,
Even now—

first_translate: are you... breaking up with me?
second_translate: Are you... saying we should break up?
...Why?

first_translate: you know the reason better than I do.
second_translate: You know the reason better than anyone.

hangle: 그러면 시그렌과 만나는 관계가 부담스러운 건가?
first_translate: then is he saying that being with me is burdensome?
second_translate: Then, is being in a relationship with Siegren burdensome?
I suppose so...

first_translate: siegren must have heard my conversation with gunter.
second_translate: siegren must have heard his conversation with gunter.

first_translate: that’s why he’s breaking up with me.
second_translate: That’s why he is breaking up with me.

first_translate: if I think about it calmly,
second_translate: If I think about it calmly,
This is the situation I wanted.

hangle: 원래의 나는 시그렌을 그저 내가 쓴 소설의 남자주인공으로만 생각했고,
first_translate: I originally thought of siegren as the male protagonist of the novel I wrote,
second_translate: I originally saw Siegren as merely the male protagonist of the novel I had written,

first_translate: and becoming lovers was only temporary.
second_translate: Becoming lovers was only temporary.

hangle: 언젠간 원작대로 돌아갈 것이라고 되뇌고 있었어.
first_translate: I kept telling myself that we would return to the original story one day.
second_translate: I kept telling myself that things would eventually go back to the original story.

first_translate: so this is the right thing to do.
second_translate: So this is how it should be, right?

hangle: 내심 정해왔던 끝이 마침내 왔을 뿐.
first_translate: the ending I had inwardly decided has finally come.
second_translate: The ending I had inwardly decided on has finally come.
...But

hangle: 정말 지금도 시그렌은 내게 원작의 남자 주인공 뿐인 걸까?
first_translate: is siegren really just the male protagonist of the original story to me?
second_translate: Is Siegren really still just the male protagonist of the original story to me?
Fiona.

first_translate: if my existence is a burden to you,
second_translate: If my existence is a burden to you,
I’ll stop everything.
...I see.

first_translate: just like how I hurt siegren,
second_translate: Just like how I was hurt by Siegren,
He was also hurt by me.

hangle: 이미 정해져 있는 대답을 내가 괜히 물은 걸까.
first_translate: maybe I asked him a question when I already knew the answer.
second_translate: Maybe I asked a question I already knew the answer to.
Alright, then.
…Goodbye,
Fiona.
Don't go.
Don't go, Siegren.

first_translate: I didn’t mean to hurt you.
second_translate: I never intended to hurt you.

hangle: 나를 걱정해서, 나를 좋아하기 때문에 그런 말을 한 걸 알아.
first_translate: I know you said that because you were worried and cared about me.
second_translate: I know you said that because you were worried about me and liked me.

hangle: 하지만 내가 써 내린 세계에 대한 책임이 있으니 네 걱정을 모른 척했어.
first_translate: but I ignored your worries because I had a responsibility to the world I wrote.
second_translate: But I pretended not to notice your worries because I had a responsibility to the world I have written.

hangle: 사실 난 그저. 겁이 난 것뿐일지도 몰라,
second_translate: Honestly, I might have just been scared.

first_translate: I keep falling endlessly for you,
second_translate: I keep falling for you endlessly.

first_translate: but I have to let you go one day.
second_translate: But I know that one day, I have to let you go.

hangle: 너의 행복을 위한 길은 원작대로 돌아가게 만드는 것이라고 생각하고 또 생각했어.
first_translate: I kept thinking that the way for you to be happy was to return to the original story.
second_translate: I kept thinking over and over that the way for you to be happy was to return to the original story.
But...
Really,

first_translate: will it be okay to let you go?
second_translate: Will it really be okay to let you go?
How could it possibly be okay?
The ending I had hoped for...

hangle: 내게 아무것도 아니지 않았다는 걸 알았는데.
first_translate: ...that the ending I wanted wasn’t nothing to me?
second_translate: I realized that the ending I wanted wasn’t meaningless to me.

first_translate: I want to be by your side.
second_translate: I want to stay by your side.
Don't go, Siegren.

first_translate: I don’t want to break up.
second_translate: I don't want to break up.
Why...?

hangle: 나 때문에 울 정도로 고민하지 마.
first_translate: don’t worry about me so much that you cry.
second_translate: Don't agonize over me to the point of tears.
Fiona.
How could it possibly be okay...?
It's not okay.

first_translate: why are you holding me back?
second_translate: Why are you stopping me?

first_translate: you’re not a burden to me.
second_translate: You're not a burden.

first_translate: I keep wanting you more and more,
second_translate: I keep wanting you more and more as time goes by.

hangle: 네가 이 마음을 알면 부담스러워 할 것 같았어.
first_translate: but I thought you would be burdened if you knew how I felt.
second_translate: I thought you might feel burdened if you knew how I felt.
That can't be true.
Then...
…Give yourself to me.
...be mine.
Siegren, I won’t be afraid.
Stay with me, always.

first_translate: I’ll make you happy by my side.
second_translate: I'll make you happy by staying by your side.
fiona...
…Haha.
Are you... laughing?!
I'm serious--
fiona.

hangle: 어린 시절 네가 나를 위해 울어줬을 때부터
second_translate: Since the time you cried for me when we were children...

first_translate: ...since you cried for me when we were young.
second_translate: I've liked you since then.
I like you too.
I won’t run away anymore.

hangle: 걱정도 안 시키고, 네 옆에 꼭 붙어있을 거야
first_translate: I won’t worry you, and I will stick by your side.
second_translate: I won't make you worry, and I will stick by your side.

first_translate: I’m going to get jealous from now on.
second_translate: I'm going to be jealous from now on.

hangle: 상대가 나보다 훨씬 좋은 여자라 해도 순순히 헤어져 주지 않을 거고.
first_translate: I won’t break up with you even if the other person is a much better woman than me.
second_translate: I won’t let you go so easily, even if she is a much better woman than me.
Do whatever you want with me.
I’m yours.
fiona.

hangle: 너는 항상 나를 잘 가지고 있어야 해.
first_translate: you always have to keep me by your side.
second_translate: You always have to take good care of me.

hangle: 마음속에서 차오르는 기쁨에 질식할 것 같다.
first_translate: I feel like I might suffocate from the rising joy in my heart.
second_translate: I feel like I might suffocate from the joy welling up inside me.
You can't back out now.

first_translate: this is what I wished for.
second_translate: This is what I wished for.
From now on,
There’s no turning back now.

hangle: 독자님들의 사랑과 관심으로 <내 남자 주인공의 아내가 되었다> 시즌 2가 무사히 마무리되었습니다. 작가님들의 휴식과 재정비 기간을 가지고 더 아름답고 재밌는 시즌 3으로 찾아뵙겠습니다. 앞으로도 많은 기대와 사랑 부탁드립니다. 감사합니다.
first_translate: Season 2 of “I Became the Wife of the Male Lead” has come to an end thanks to all the love and support from our readers. We will return with a more beautiful and fun season 3 after the author takes a break and gets ready. Please look forward to it and continue to show us your love. Thank you.
second_translate: Season 2 of “I Became the Wife of the Male Lead” has successfully come to an end thanks to the love and support of our readers. After a period of rest and preparation, we will return with an even more beautiful and exciting Season 3. Please continue to look forward to it and show your support. Thank you.
